action_output:
Reason: Currently, the "Audio" tab within the Files app has been selected, but there are no audio files present in the Downloads folder. To continue browsing other parts of the audio files, it may be beneficial to view files from different directories. The "Show roots" option could allow a navigation to other possible locations for audio files.
Action: {"action_type": "click", "index": 27}
action_reason: Currently, the "Audio" tab within the Files app has been selected, but there are no audio files present in the Downloads folder. To continue browsing other parts of the audio files, it may be beneficial to view files from different directories. The "Show roots" option could allow a navigation to other possible locations for audio files.
summary: Action selected: {"action_type": "click", "index": 27}. Clicked "Show roots" to browse audio files from directories other than Downloads since no audio files were found in Downloads; new screen shows other storage locations.
